author: Pamela Muse
text:
Looking for “out of the box”, progressive and innovative Chief Communications Officer (or related titles) job announcements, descriptions, etc.  Copies of brochures job descriptions, etc would be very helpful!
Pam

title: Innovative Chief Communications Officer Job Discriptions
